word

Class StringWord

  • java.lang.Object
    • word.StringWord
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SubStringWord

    public class StringWord
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: StringWord

    Description: class which displays a single word on the game panel.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Diana Sighinolfi
    See Also:
    GamePanel

      Constructor which instantiates a new string word.

        Method that draws word on the panel.

        g - the Graphics from the GamePanel.paint(java.awt.Graphics) method
        parola - the word to be drawn

        Method which increase the y-axis of the word.

      • getSelected

        public boolean getSelected()
        Indicates that the word drawn is selected or not.
        Returns:
        true if the word is selected, false otherwise.

      • setSelected

        Selects the word.
        Parameters:
        isSelected - true for selecting the word
